lyrics.ChnStr: 写信告诉我今天 海是什么颜色
lyrics.Pinyin: 写[xiě]信[xìn]告[gào]诉[sù]我[wǒ]今[jīn]天[tiān] 海[hǎi]是[shì]什[shí]么[mó]颜[yán]色[sè]
lyrics.EngStr: Write me a letter, telling me what color the sea is today

lyrics.ChnStr: 夜夜陪著你的海 心情又如何
lyrics.Pinyin: 夜[yè]夜[yè]陪[péi]著[zhù]你[nǐ]的[de]海[hǎi] 心[xīn]情[qíng]又[yòu]如[rú]何[hé]
lyrics.EngStr: The sea that accompanies you every night, how does it feel?

lyrics.ChnStr: 灰色是不想说 蓝色是忧郁
lyrics.Pinyin: 灰[huī]色[sè]是[shì]不[bù]想[xiǎng]说[shuō] 蓝[lán]色[sè]是[shì]忧[yōu]郁[yù]
lyrics.EngStr: Gray is what I don't want to say, blue is sadness

lyrics.ChnStr: 而漂泊的你 狂浪的心 停在哪里
lyrics.Pinyin: 而[ér]漂[piāo]泊[bó]的[de]你[nǐ] 狂[kuáng]浪[làng]的[de]心[xīn] 停[tíng]在[zài]哪[nǎ]里[lǐ]
lyrics.EngStr: And where does your drifting, stormy heart stop?

lyrics.ChnStr: 写信告诉我今夜 你想要梦什么
lyrics.Pinyin: 写[xiě]信[xìn]告[gào]诉[sù]我[wǒ]今[jīn]夜[yè] 你[nǐ]想[xiǎng]要[yào]梦[mèng]什[shí]么[mó]
lyrics.EngStr: Write me a letter, telling me what you want to dream tonight

lyrics.ChnStr: 梦里外的我是否 都让你无从选择
lyrics.Pinyin: 梦[mèng]里[lǐ]外[wài]的[de]我[wǒ]是[shì]否[fǒu] 都[dū]让[ràng]你[nǐ]无[wú]从[cóng]选[xuǎn]择[zé]
lyrics.EngStr: Whether the me inside and outside of your dream makes you unable to choose

lyrics.ChnStr: 我揪著一颗心 整夜都闭不了眼睛
lyrics.Pinyin: 我[wǒ]揪[jiū]著[zhù]一[yī]颗[kē]心[xīn] 整[zhěng]夜[yè]都[dū]闭[bì]不[bù]了[le]眼[yǎn]睛[jīng]
lyrics.EngStr: I hold my heart tight, unable to close my eyes all night

lyrics.ChnStr: 为何你明明动了情 却又不靠近
lyrics.Pinyin: 为[wéi]何[hé]你[nǐ]明[míng]明[míng]动[dòng]了[le]情[qíng] 却[què]又[yòu]不[bù]靠[kào]近[jìn]
lyrics.EngStr: Why do you clearly have feelings, but still don't come closer?

lyrics.ChnStr: 听 海哭的声音
lyrics.Pinyin: 听[tīng] 海[hǎi]哭[kū]的[de]声[shēng]音[yīn]
lyrics.EngStr: Listen to the sound of the sea crying

lyrics.ChnStr: 叹惜著谁又被伤了心 却还不清醒
lyrics.Pinyin: 叹[tàn]惜[xī]著[zhù]谁[shuí]又[yòu]被[bèi]伤[shāng]了[le]心[xīn] 却[què]还[huán]不[bù]清[qīng]醒[xǐng]
lyrics.EngStr: Sighing, who has been hurt but is still not awake?

lyrics.ChnStr: 一定不是我 至少我很冷静
lyrics.Pinyin: 一[yī]定[dìng]不[bù]是[shì]我[wǒ] 至[zhì]少[shǎo]我[wǒ]很[hěn]冷[lěng]静[jìng]
lyrics.EngStr: It definitely isn't me, at least I'm calm

lyrics.ChnStr: 可是泪水 就连泪水也都不相信
lyrics.Pinyin: 可[kě]是[shì]泪[lèi]水[shuǐ] 就[jiù]连[lián]泪[lèi]水[shuǐ]也[yě]都[dū]不[bù]相[xiāng]信[xìn]
lyrics.EngStr: But tears, even tears, don't believe in it

lyrics.ChnStr: 听 海哭的声音
lyrics.Pinyin: 听[tīng] 海[hǎi]哭[kū]的[de]声[shēng]音[yīn]
lyrics.EngStr: Listen to the sound of the sea crying

lyrics.ChnStr: 这片海未免也太多情 悲泣到天明
lyrics.Pinyin: 这[zhè]片[piàn]海[hǎi]未[wèi]免[miǎn]也[yě]太[tài]多[duō]情[qíng] 悲[bēi]泣[qì]到[dào]天[tiān]明[míng]
lyrics.EngStr: This sea is too sentimental, crying until dawn

lyrics.ChnStr: 写封信给我 就当最后约定
lyrics.Pinyin: 写[xiě]封[fēng]信[xìn]给[gěi]我[wǒ] 就[jiù]当[dāng]最[zuì]后[hòu]约[yuē]定[dìng]
lyrics.EngStr: Write a letter to me, as a final agreement

lyrics.ChnStr: 说你在离开我的时候 是怎样的心情
lyrics.Pinyin: 说[shuō]你[nǐ]在[zài]离[lí]开[kāi]我[wǒ]的[de]时[shí]候[hòu] 是[shì]怎[zěn]样[yàng]的[de]心[xīn]情[qíng]
lyrics.EngStr: Tell me what your feelings were when you left me
